messages.content: ComfyUI-I2VGEN-XL is an implementation of the i2vgen-xl model integrated into the ComfyUI graphical interface to generate images and videos.
To install ComfyUI-I2VGEN-XL, you should clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of the ComfyUI location and then run pip install -r requirements.txt.
What should I do if I encounter a ValueError about relative import?

To fix a ValueError with relative import, you should delete the content in the files `~/.cache/modelscope/hub/damo/i2vgen-xl/tools/__init__.py` and `~/.cache/modelscope/hub/damo/i2vgen-xl/tools/modules/__init__.py`.
What if I run into CUDA out of memory?
If you experience a CUDA out of memory issue, you should edit the file `~/.cache/modelscope/hub/damo/i2vgen-xl/ms_wrapper.py` and change `self.model.to(gpu)` to `self.model.half().to(gpu)`.
What is the base workflow for ComfyUI-I2VGEN-XL?

The base workflow for ComfyUI-I2VGEN-XL is demonstrated in an image with a link to the workflow JSON file: and the workflow JSON file can be found at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-I2VGEN-XL/blob/main/workflow.json.
